item.title: Hugo 按文章中的时间排序
item.description: +{{ $sortedPages := sort $pages "Params.date" "desc" }} + + <div class="flex flex-col w-full max-w-4xl lg:max-w-5xl relative"> <div class="flex flex-row"> <section class="flex flex-col w-full md:w-4/5"> - {{ range (.Paginate $pages).Pages }} + {{ range (.Paginate $sortedPages).Pages }} <article class="flex flex-col gap-y-3 p-6 mt-6 mx-2 md:mx-0 rounded-lg shadow-md bg-white dark:bg-gray-700"> <div data-hveid="CBEQAA"> <div>
